name: Morphometrics Support Code
tagline: Various R scripts and functions for morphometrics data collection and analysis (complement for geomorph)
body:
**On this page you can find R scripts that perform various functions for morphometrics data collection and analysis. They are usually to be used as a complement to [geomorph R package](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/geomorph/).**

Read in multiple Morphologika Files that each contain a single specimen and combine as a 3D array
[read.multi.morphologika.R](https://github.com/EmSherratt/MorphometricSupportCode/blob/master/read.multi.morphologika.R)

Source file to batch convert ASCII ply files to ASCII stl files and to write coordinate data to SPHARM's .landmarkAscii file
(SPHARM (http://www.enallagma.com/SPHARM.php) is a software application to perform 3-dimensional spherical harmonic analyses of triangular mesh surfaces (Shen et al. 2009 Evolution).
[SPHARM R support code.R](https://github.com/EmSherratt/MorphometricSupportCode/blob/master/SPHARM%20R%20support%20code.R)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
